DESCRIPTION: Using the COLOR field, this keyword is colored pink instead of the normal keyword color.
Attacks that are Magic use Focus instead of Strength.
Trigger the following effect upon dealing unblocked Attack damage.
Discard this card if you play another one while this is in your hand.
Retain excess Block at the start of your turn.
Trigger the following effect when this card is discarded during your turn.
Orb: Increases damage but damages you every turn. When Evoked, deals damage to ALL enemies.

Negates the next buff.
Cancels out Artifact.

When you take attack damage, lose 1 Focus if you have any.
If you have none or play another Concentration power, drop the power.
You may also drop it at the start of your turn.
